title: Great Notley Country Park Walking and Cycle Route

nearby.description: Bishop's Stortford Canal and River Walk

images.title: John Lemay / Lakes, Great Notley Country Park
images.caption: There are two man-made lakes in the Country Park, which take surface water from the new village and "clean" the water before it runs into a local watercourse.

images.title: Chris Clarke / Bird Sculpture above Great Notley Country Park
images.caption: Bird Sculpture above Great Notley Country Park. This sculpture looks out over the country park.The A120 is on the left and the village of Great Notley in the distance on the right.

images.caption: Pond, Great Notley. A picturesque spot in the village.

description: A short walk or cycle around the 100 acre Great Notley Country Park in Braintree, Essex. The park is a mixture of wetland and open grassland with views of the Essex Countryside. Cycle hire is available within the park and there is also a cafe for refreshments. Great Notley is located a couple of miles south west of Braintree. The Flitch Way passes just to the north of the park. This shared cycling and walking trail runs along a disused railway line to Bishop's Stortford via Great Dunmow .

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: The on site Skylark café serves a good range of meals and snacks. There is indoor and outdoor seating. If you fancy a pub lunch head into Great Notley village where you could visit the Prince Louis. It's located in a nice spot on Notley Green at postcode CM77 7US. They serve good food and have a pleasant large garden to relax in.

details.subtitle: Dog Walking
details.content: The park is a great place for dog walking with miles of trails and off lead area. The cafe mentioned above is also dog friendly.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: To continue your walking in the area try our Braintree Walk. This takes you along the River Blackwater and up to the windmill at Bocking.

display_address: Great Notley Bypass, Great Notley, Braintree, Essex, England, CM77 7JS, United Kingdom
